SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Ghimire, (2005), Operating cost of biogas plants in Bangladesh
Assumptions: Conversion of cost in BDT to US$ by 1 US$ = 78 BDT

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Kumar et al., (2015), Operating cost of biogas plant in India (Higher value)
Assumptions: Plant Size: 8m3.  Gas produced: 17,045.6.2MJ/yr. Cost: 7,318 Rupee. Conversion of cost in INR to US$ by 1 US$ = 68 INR

SOURCE ID: Author/Org, Date, Info: Kumar et al., (2015), Operating cost of biogas plant in India (Lower value)
Assumptions: Plant Size: 2m3. Gas produced: 10,638.2MJ/yr. Cost: 3,405 rupee. Conversion of cost in INR to US$ by 1 US$ = 68 INR
